title: Andrographis | Advanced Orthomolecular Research | AOR
description: Andrographis is a natural immune-support supplement that assists your body’s natural defenses and promotes wellness. It provides more benefits than those of echinacea.
text:
Andrographis
Supports a healthy immune system*
- A potent herb that provides noticeable results
- Powerful immune support
Product Information
The human body is fully equipped to protect itself from internal invaders. Sometimes, external factors impact your body and compromise its ability to effectively battle those threats to your health, leading to a poor immune system response.
Andrographis paniculata is one of the most popular medicinal plants used to support health. Found primarily in Asia and India, this health supporting herb has been used in traditional Chinese, Ayurvedic, and Thai herbalism, and by Scandinavians for centuries for immune support.
AOR Advantage
AOR™ has taken advantage of this potent herb by introducing Andrographis, a natural immune-support supplement that assists your body’s natural defenses and promotes wellness. Andrographis is an effective supplement that provides more benefits than those of echinacea.
Andrographis contains a standardized extract of Andrographis paniculata to help reduce cold like symptoms.
AOR™ guarantees that all ingredients have been declared on the label. Contains no wheat, gluten, nuts, peanuts, sesame seeds, sulfites, mustard, soy, dairy, eggs, fish, shellfish or any animal byproduct.
Take one capsule twice daily with or without food, or as directed by a qualified health care practitioner. Do not crush, blend or mix capsules, swallow capsule whole.
Do not use if you are allergic to plants of the Acanthaceae family or if you are pregnant or breastfeeding. Consult a health care practitioner prior to use if you are taking immunosuppressant, anticoagulant, antiplatelet or hypotensive medications (or supplements). Some people may experience gastric discomfort, vomiting and/or loss of appetite. Consult a health care practitioner if symptoms persist or worsen or for use beyond 7 days. Keep out of reach of children
*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
† Daily Value not established.
Other Ingredients: microcrystalline cellulose, silicon dioxide, corn starch. Capsule: hypromellose.
